Generate CNA Plot from Regions

generateCNAPlotFromRegions2.Rd

Generates a genome-wide copy number alteration (CNA) plot by combining coverage data from a BigWig file and variant calls from a VCF file. Delta values are computed from the coverage data and overlaid with variant regions. Optionally, cytoband annotations can be added.

generateCNAPlotFromRegions2(
  depth_bigwig_file,
  variant_file,
  threshold = 1.5,
  downsample = 0.01,
  point_size = 0.5,
  colors = NULL,
  log_scale = TRUE,
  remove_centromeres = TRUE,
  max_value = NULL,
  min_value = NULL,
  min_variant_distance = 10000,
  samplename = "",
  show_cytobands = FALSE,
  cytoband_angle = 90,
  chr_filter = NULL,
  return_data = FALSE
)

Arguments

depth_bigwig_file

Character. File path to a BigWig file containing coverage (depth) information.

variant_file

Character. File path to a VCF file containing variant call information.

threshold

Numeric. Delta threshold used for display. Default is 1.5.

downsample

Numeric. Proportion of the coverage data to retain after downsampling. Default is 0.01.

point_size

Numeric. Size of the points in the plot. Default is 0.5.

colors

Named vector. Colors to be used for chromosomes; if NULL, default colors are assigned.

log_scale

Logical. If TRUE, applies a log scale (unused in code, but available for future extension). Default is TRUE.

remove_centromeres

Logical. If TRUE, centromere regions are removed (unused in code, but available for extension). Default is TRUE.

max_value

Numeric. Maximum delta value for setting plot y-axis limits. Default is NULL.

min_value

Numeric. Minimum delta value for setting plot y-axis limits. Default is NULL.

min_variant_distance

Numeric. Minimum distance (in bp) for a variant call to be retained. Default is 10000.

samplename

Character. A label for the sample which is displayed in the plot title.

show_cytobands

Logical. If TRUE, cytoband labels are added to the variant calls. Default is FALSE.

cytoband_angle

Numeric. Angle (in degrees) to rotate the cytoband text labels. Default is 90.

chr_filter

Character. If provided, limits the analysis to the specified chromosome.

return_data

Logical. If TRUE, returns a list containing the plot along with the underlying coverage and variant call data. Default is FALSE.

Value

Either a ggplot2 object representing the CNA plot, or, if return_data is TRUE, a list with elements plot, coverage_data, and variant_calls.

Details

This function performs the following steps:

  1. Imports coverage data from a BigWig file using import.bw() from rtracklayer and converts it into a data frame.

  2. Filters for valid chromosomes (chr1-22, X, Y), optionally restricting to a single chromosome.

  3. Downsamples the coverage data and computes a delta value for each data point.

  4. Reads variant calls from a VCF file using fread() from data.table, parsing out the end positions and variant types.

  5. Optionally annotates cytoband information for each variant call using overlaps with hg19IdeogramCyto (assumed to be available in the global environment).

  6. Filters variant calls by a minimum distance if specified.

  7. Computes cumulative genomic offsets via the generate_offsets() function.

  8. Constructs and returns a plot built with ggplot2 that shows the coverage data points, highlighted variant regions, and optionally cytoband labels.

Contents
